mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_tiezi WHERE createtime > #{nowdate} ) tttiezi, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_tiezi WHERE createtime > #{qnowdate} AND createtime < #{nowdate} ) zttiezi, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_tiezi) ztiezi, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbbs_user) zuser, (SELECT MAX(id) FROM jbbs_user) userid, (SELECT loginname FROM jbbs_user WHERE id=(SELECT MAX(id) FROM jbbs_user)) username FROM DUAL where 1=1

SELECT aaa.id,aaa.name,aaa.flag FROM (SELECT *,'1' flag FROM jbbs_tiezi ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,7 )aaa
UNION ALL
SELECT bbb.id,bbb.name,bbb.flag FROM ( SELECT t1.*,'2' flag FROM jbbs_tiezi t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT tieziid ,MAX(createtime) huifucreatetime FROM jbbs_huifu GROUP BY tieziid ) t2 ON t2.tieziid=t1.id ORDER BY t2.huifucreatetime DESC LIMIT 0, 7)bbb
UNION ALL
SELECT ccc.id,ccc.name,ccc.flag FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM jbbs_huifu tt1 WHERE t1.id= tt1.tieziid )counts ,t1.*,'3' flag FROM jbbs_tiezi t1 WHERE t1.createtime > ${zdate} ORDER BY counts DESC LIMIT 0,7 ) ccc
